snippet: Videos show a white officer throwing the teacher to the ground and another telling her that whites may be wary of black people because of their “violent tendencies.”...

byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER MELE, NIRAJ CHOKSHI and CHRISTINE HAUSER

lead_paragraph: Videos show a white officer throwing the teacher to the ground and another telling her that whites may be wary of black people because of their “violent tendencies.”

headline.main: Texas Investigates Violent Traffic Arrest of Black Teacher
